Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: A lot more trust in human evaluation compared to AI because teacher has more experience in evaluating and I believe they would give more meaningful critics

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher's feedback makes me feels more appreciated compared to AI

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I feel that AI sometimes only give surface improvement but lack deeper critics
